title: Did Justin Trudeau stop teaching at Vancouver Special School under the sex scandal cloud?
subtitle: A few days before Canada ' s federal elections in 2019, rumors emerged about the departure of the next Prime Minister in 2001 from the West Point Gray Academy.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2001, Justin Trudo left his teaching position at the West Point Gray Academy after having a sexual relationship with either a student or a student.
